Name: Byrrh Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: Canadian blended whisky provides the backbone over which layers of complex French aromatised wine are layered.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Byrrh Cocktail contains 190 calories
